job_title: Anonymous Employee in Clapham, London, England
pros: Inclusive working culture, all staff levels valued, with plenty of communication routeways for staff, executive and clients. Learning and development, progression opportunities are an attractive part of the workplace. A lot of thought has gone into the design of the office and it's organisation.
cons: Salary not competitive but workplace culture and opportunities more than made up for this.
